Text: CLE creditsthis time we are not offering CLE credits for the Legal eCommerce Training Course you attended in Washington DC However we are seriously looking into the possibility of doing so in the future I apologize for the delayed response to your question Regards Maureen Benjamin Training Course Operations Manager Phone Fax wwwmarcusevanscom
